product.title: InStyler Professional Hair Straightening Iron Curling Iron Straightener&Curler Styler 2 In 1 Multi Hair Styling Tool Flat Iron With Brush
product.description:
Hair Straightening Curling Straightener&Curler Styler 2 In 1 Multi Hair Styling Tool Flat
Features:
1.Adopted infrared heating , fast heating, long life and good temperature stability.
2. Exquisite ceramic plate, smooth and bright, less damage to the hair.
3.Rapidly heating within , when reaching the desired temperature, you can operate it.
4.Thermostatic technology, up to 210 Deg.C, your hair from over-heating.
5. Ergonomic handle gives you a comfortable using experience for its lightweight design.
Product Description:
Package included:
1x Rotating 2-Way Hair Curler Straightener

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
